ImyaTweaks.Title: Attractiveness settings for the Harbor Bridges OW + NW

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Set Value For Attractiveness Of Harbor Bridges OW + NW MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines how many attraction points the Harbor Bridges in OW + NW gives ( Mod default settings = 5 )

ImyaTweaks.Title: Attractiveness settings for the Harbor Bridges Enbesa

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Set Value For Attractiveness Of Harbor Bridges Enbesa MU
ImyaExpose.Description: Determines how many attraction points the Harbor Bridges in Enbesa gives ( Mod default settings = 5 )
